ingredients.content: 250 g skinless chicken thigh fillet, cut into pieces (1 - 2 cm)
150 g potato, cut into pieces (1 - 2 cm)
80 g carrot, cut into pieces (1 - 2 cm)
70 g banana, cut into pieces (1 - 2 cm)

preparations.content: Place chicken pieces, potato, carrot, water and butter ino mixing bowl and cook <b>8-10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add banana and purée <b>20-30 sec/speed 4<b> <b>-<b> <b>8, increasing speed gradually<b>. Allow to cool prior to serving.
